name: Paper.io 3D: Multiplayer
description:
Are you a fan of thrilling territory games? Witness an amazing amalgamation of satisfying coloring strokes and a thrilling game play with Paper.io in 3D mode.

Smooth drawing experience
Discover the smooth drawing experience of Paper.io now in 3D! Create your zone, avoid others players and colors unique 3D shapes! Collect stars as you play and reach 100% to unlock new levels and bonuses!

Mark your territory
Pick a character, mark your territory and fill as much color as you want in that area. Remember that the more you draw, the stronger you get. Conquer as much territory as possible and beat the competition.

Kill the enemy
Steer clear of powerful enemies who can kill you in seconds simply by touching your tail. Survive to win from your multiplayer competitors. Set new record and improve your game rankings every day.

How to play:
- Hit the play button and pick a character
- Control the moving color block
- Steer clear of your competitors
- Grow your coloring area to win over your rivals
- Make new score records

Features of Paper.io 3D: Multiplayer:
- Smooth and responsive drawing experience
- Interactive game controls
- Endless drawing fun in a big area
- Unlock new players by kill enemies or growing your territory.
- Exciting new game characters to choose from the store.

Would you like to try out the brand new drawing paper game? Download Paper.io 3D: Multiplayer today!
